name: Harvest Hands - Pre-Alpha Demo
description:
This is a pre-alpha demo and will not be updated to become the full game! 

Experience the core mechanics and first few minutes of Harvest Hands. Meet your mentor the Master Farmer and the local merchant Laura. Till, plant, water and harvest your first crops and help the Master Farmer fix the barn.

Demo Features:

  • First person farming
  • Resource collecting, with trees to chop down, rocks to mine and mushrooms to harvest
  • The full farmstead to roam, explore and farm on
  • 9  crops and plants
  • 2 NPCs with unique dialogue
  • 6 items to construct and craft on your farm

Full Game Description:

Harvest Hands is a first person farm life game, where you're placed in the shoes of the apprentice farmer.

With your beloved township devastated and your master missing, you set out on an epic quest to unravel the mysteries of the land and of his disappearance.  Cultivate crops, do jobs for the townsfolk, explore an expansive world and with the help of your friends bring the master farmer home.
